title: You Can't Have These HOFers ......They are SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: You Can't Have These HOFers ......They are SOLD
posts.post_content:
They are all pretty well beaten already.

1.  Recipe for Disaster - A Bender on a Cycle in the Trees - SOLD - Surviving Benders on Cycles are uncommon.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/21403/bender-trees-cycle-350-hof[/IMG]

2.  From Russia Well Loved - Collins on a Tolstoi SGC 10 - SOLD - Not a bad card for the grade

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/21404/collins-j-tolstoi-hof[/IMG]

3.  Giant Hip Glove - McGraw BVG 1.5 - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10159/mcgraw-hip-hof[/IMG]

4.  Herman Munster Look Alike Winner - Clarke Portrait - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10787/clarke-f-portrait-hof[/IMG]

5.  Portrait of a Rube as a Young Man - Marquard Portrait - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10781/marquard-portrait[/IMG]

Or take em all (one left) for $88

Any no fee payment accepted.  Add 3% for regular PP.
Bender reduced.  Perfect for the beater collector who wants some rear end diversity.  Please note there is only one hole, perfect for viewing the next solar eclipse.;)  Now only $88.

Frank,

Is the BB gun included with the Bender?

Scot

[quote name="sreader3" post=1410397]Frank,

Is the BB gun included with the Bender?

The shooter missed the target, so I fired him.:D
